summary: This is a brief email exchange regarding obtaining Thomas' work schedule, possibly in connection with the Epstein death investigation. The email references the Federal Protective Service and appears to be an internal inquiry about documentation.

persons.name: Thomas
persons.context: Mentioned as someone whose work schedule is being sought, likely in connection with the Epstein death investigation.

persons.name: CPP
persons.context: Appears to be the sender or recipient of the email, identified as a Special Agent with the Federal Protective Service, Region 2.

connections.description: CPP, as a Special Agent, is inquiring about Thomas' work schedule, likely as part of an investigation.

events.title: Inquiry into Thomas' work schedule
events.description: An email exchange where someone asks if they have Thomas' work schedule or need to obtain it, referencing the Epstein death investigation.

events.title: Epstein death investigation
events.description: Referenced as the context for seeking Thomas' work schedule, indicating ongoing investigative work.

keyFacts: The email seeks Thomas' work schedule, potentially in connection with the Epstein death investigation.
The correspondence involves a Special Agent (CPP) from the Federal Protective Service, Region 2.
The document suggests investigative activity following Epstein's death, focusing on personnel schedules.
